程序包 Jest

类 VirtualPlayer

java.lang.Object
Jest.Player
Jest.VirtualPlayer
public class VirtualPlayer
extends Player
VirtualPlayer is a class which represents for human players. As virtual player is a player, it extends the class Player.

  • 字段概要

    从类继承的字段 Jest.Player

    hastakencard

  • 构造器概要

    构造器 
    构造器 说明
    VirtualPlayer​(int number, Level level)
    Constructor of the virtual player.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    Level getLevel()
    To get the level of the virtual player.
    int getnumber()
    To get the number of the virtual player.

    To set the level of the virtual player.
    void StrategyOffer()
    Call the function StrategyOffer(VirtualPlayer vp)
    Player StrategyTake​(java.util.LinkedList<Player> offeredPlayers)
    Call the function StrategyTake(LinkedList<Player> offeredPlayers,VirtualPlayer vp)
    java.lang.String toString()
    Overwrite the function toString() to show the information of the virtual player.

    从类继承的方法 Jest.Player

    • VirtualPlayer

      public VirtualPlayer​(int number, Level level)
      Constructor of the virtual player.
      参数:
      number - the number to set.
      level - the level to set.

  • 方法详细资料

    • getnumber

      public int getnumber()
      To get the number of the virtual player.
      返回:
      type of interger, the number of the virtual player.

    • getLevel

      public Level getLevel()
      To get the level of the virtual player.
      返回:
      type of Level, the level of the virtual player.

    • setLevel

      public void setLevel​(Level level)
      To set the level of the virtual player.
      参数:
      level - the level to set.

    • StrategyOffer

      public void StrategyOffer()
      Call the function StrategyOffer(VirtualPlayer vp)

    • StrategyTake

      public Player StrategyTake​(java.util.LinkedList<Player> offeredPlayers)
      Call the function StrategyTake(LinkedList<Player> offeredPlayers,VirtualPlayer vp)
      参数:
      offeredPlayers - is the list of players from whom the virtual player can take offer.
      返回:
      type of Player who will be the next player to take offers.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overwrite the function toString() to show the information of the virtual player.
      覆盖:
      toString 在类中 Player
